name: UIAccessibilityTraits
desc: Constants that describe how an accessibility element behaves.

items.name: static var none: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element has no traits.

items.name: static var button: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like a button.

items.name: static var link: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like a link.

items.name: static var image: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like an image.

items.name: static var searchField: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like a search field.

items.name: static var keyboardKey: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like a keyboard key.

items.name: static var staticText: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like static text that can't change.

items.name: static var header: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element is a header that divides content into sections, such as the title of a navigation bar.

items.name: static var tabBar: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element behaves like a tab bar.

items.name: static var summaryElement: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element provides summary information when the app starts.

items.name: static var selected: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element is currently in a selected state.

items.name: static var notEnabled: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element isn't in an enabled state and doesn't respond to user interaction.

items.name: static var adjustable: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element allows continuous adjustment through a range of values.

items.name: static var allowsDirectInteraction: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element allows direct touch interaction for VoiceOver users.

items.name: static var updatesFrequently: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element frequently updates its label or value.

items.name: static var causesPageTurn: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element causes an automatic page turn when VoiceOver finishes reading the text within it.

items.name: static var playsSound: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element plays its own sound when the user activates it.

items.name: static var startsMediaSession: UIAccessibilityTraits
items.desc: The accessibility element starts a media session when the user activates it.

items.name: typealias UIAccessibilityTraits.ArrayLiteralElement
items.desc: The type of the elements of an array literal.

items.name: typealias UIAccessibilityTraits.Element
items.desc: The element type of the option set.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt64)
items.desc: Creates a new accessibility traits structure using an unsigned integer.
